languages.text: {n}Знакомый {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}шепот{/d} скребется на задворках сознания. Или это внутренний голос?{/n} "Даже если он услышит, какое Ему до тебя дело? Он не спас Теодору и тебя не спасет. Ты — не его избранн{mf|ый|ая}. Но что если... вознести молитву истинно бессмертным богам? Тем, кто не скупится на дары. Тем, кто всегда готов принять тебя?"

{n}A familiar {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whisper{/d} is scratching at the periphery of your consciousness. Or is it an inner voice?{/n} "Even if He hears you, what does He care? He did not save Theodora. He will not save you either. You are not His chosen one. But what if... you offer a prayer to the gods that are truly immortal? The ones who do not hold back with their gifts? The ones who are always willing to accept you?"
languages.original_text: {n}Знакомый {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}шепот{/d} скребется на задворках сознания. Или это внутренний голос?{/n} "Даже если он услышит, какое Ему до тебя дело? Он не спас Теодору и тебя не спасет. Ты — не его избранн{mf|ый|ая}. Но что если... вознести молитву истинно бессмертным богам? Тем, кто не скупится на дары. Тем, кто всегда готов принять тебя?"

The ones who are always willing to accept you?"

languages.text: {n}Ein vertrautes {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}Flüstern{/d} kratzt am Rand deines Bewusstseins. Oder ist es eine innere Stimme?{/n} "Selbst, wenn er Euch hört, was schert es ihn? Er hat Theodora nicht gerettet. Er wird auch Euch nicht retten. Ihr seid nicht {mf|sein Auserwählter|seine Auserwählte}. Aber was, wenn ... Ihr zu den wahrhaft unsterblichen Göttern betet? Jenen, die nicht mit ihren Geschenken geizen? Jenen, die immer bereit sind, Euch zu akzeptieren?"
languages.original_text: {n}A familiar {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whisper{/d} is scratching at the periphery of your consciousness. Or is it an inner voice?{/n} "Even if He hears you, what does He care? He did not save Theodora. He will not save you either. You are not His chosen one. But what if... you offer a prayer to the gods that are truly immortal? The ones who do not hold back with their gifts? The ones who are always willing to accept you?"

Oder ist es eine innere Stimme?{/n} "Selbst, wenn er Euch hört, was schert es ihn? Er hat Theodora nicht gerettet. Er wird auch Euch nicht retten. Ihr seid nicht {mf|sein Auserwählter|seine Auserwählte}. Aber was, wenn ... Ihr zu den wahrhaft unsterblichen Göttern betet? Jenen, die nicht mit ihren Geschenken geizen? Jenen, die immer bereit sind, Euch zu akzeptieren?"

languages.text: {n}Un {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}susurro{/d} familiar araña los límites de tu consciencia. O tal vez venga desde dentro.{/n} «Aunque pueda oírte, ¿qué le importa? No salvó a Theodora. Tampoco te salvará a ti. No eres su elegid{mf|o|a}. Pero, ¿y si... ofreces una plegaria a dioses verdaderamente inmortales? A esos dioses que no escatiman en regalos. A esos dioses que siempre están dispuestos a aceptarte».
languages.original_text: {n}A familiar {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whisper{/d} is scratching at the periphery of your consciousness. Or is it an inner voice?{/n} "Even if He hears you, what does He care? He did not save Theodora. He will not save you either. You are not His chosen one. But what if... you offer a prayer to the gods that are truly immortal? The ones who do not hold back with their gifts? The ones who are always willing to accept you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}susurro{/d} familiar araña los límites de tu consciencia. O tal vez venga desde dentro.{/n} «Aunque pueda oírte, ¿qué le importa? No salvó a Theodora. Tampoco te salvará a ti. No eres su elegid{mf|o|a}. Pero, ¿y si... ofreces una plegaria a dioses verdaderamente inmortales? A esos dioses que no escatiman en regalos. A esos dioses que siempre están dispuestos a aceptarte».

languages.text: {n}聞き覚えのある{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}囁き{/d}があなたの意識の端々を刺激する。それとも内なる声だろうか？{/n}「主があなたの声を聴いたとして、気にされると思うか？主はシオドーラを救わなかった。あなたのことも救わないだろう。だがもし…あなたが真に不死である神に祈りを捧げたとしたら？贈り物を惜しまない者へ？いつでもあなたを喜んで受け入れてくれる者へ？」
languages.original_text: {n}A familiar {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whisper{/d} is scratching at the periphery of your consciousness. Or is it an inner voice?{/n} "Even if He hears you, what does He care? He did not save Theodora. He will not save you either. You are not His chosen one. But what if... you offer a prayer to the gods that are truly immortal? The ones who do not hold back with their gifts? The ones who are always willing to accept you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}聞き覚えのある{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}囁き{/d}があなたの意識の端々を刺激する。それとも内なる声だろうか？{/n}「主があなたの声を聴いたとして、気にされると思うか？主はシオドーラを救わなかった。あなたのことも救わないだろう。だがもし…あなたが真に不死である神に祈りを捧げたとしたら？贈り物を惜しまない者へ？いつでもあなたを喜んで受け入れてくれる者へ？」

languages.text: {n}某个熟悉的{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}低语声{/d}浮现在你的意识边缘。还是说，这实际上是来自你内心的声音？{/n}“即便祂听到了你的声音，祂又真的会在乎你吗？祂没有拯救西奥多拉，自然也不会拯救你。你并不是祂的神选者，但如果……你向真正的不朽诸神祈祷呢？向那些从不吝啬祝福的神明祈祷，向那些始终愿意接纳你的神明祈祷，又将如何呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}A familiar {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whisper{/d} is scratching at the periphery of your consciousness. Or is it an inner voice?{/n} "Even if He hears you, what does He care? He did not save Theodora. He will not save you either. You are not His chosen one. But what if... you offer a prayer to the gods that are truly immortal? The ones who do not hold back with their gifts? The ones who are always willing to accept you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}某个熟悉的{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}低语声{/d}浮现在你的意识边缘。还是说，这实际上是来自你内心的声音？{/n}“即便祂听到了你的声音，祂又真的会在乎你吗？祂没有拯救西奥多拉，自然也不会拯救你。你并不是祂的神选者，但如果……你向真正的不朽诸神祈祷呢？向那些从不吝啬祝福的神明祈祷，向那些始终愿意接纳你的神明祈祷，又将如何呢？”

languages.text: {n}Un {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}murmure{/d} familier bruisse à la périphérie de votre conscience. À moins qu'il s'agisse d'une voix intérieure ?{/n} « Quand bien même Il vous entendrait, que Lui importe ? Il n'a pas sauvé Théodora, et Il ne vous sauvera pas non plus. Vous n'êtes pas Son {mf|élu|élue}. En revanche... vous pouvez toujours adresser une prière aux vrais dieux immortels. Eux ne sont pas aussi avares de leurs bienfaits et ils sont toujours disposés à vous accepter. »
languages.original_text: {n}A familiar {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whisper{/d} is scratching at the periphery of your consciousness. Or is it an inner voice?{/n} "Even if He hears you, what does He care? He did not save Theodora. He will not save you either. You are not His chosen one. But what if... you offer a prayer to the gods that are truly immortal? The ones who do not hold back with their gifts? The ones who are always willing to accept you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}murmure{/d} familier bruisse à la périphérie de votre conscience. À moins qu'il s'agisse d'une voix intérieure ?{/n} « Quand bien même Il vous entendrait, que Lui importe ? Il n'a pas sauvé Théodora, et Il ne vous sauvera pas non plus. Vous n'êtes pas Son {mf|élu|élue}. En revanche... vous pouvez toujours adresser une prière aux vrais dieux immortels. Eux ne sont pas aussi avares de leurs bienfaits et ils sont toujours disposés à vous accepter. »

languages.text: {n}Aşina olduğun bir {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}fısıltı{/d}, zihninin sınırlarını kazıyor. Yoksa bu iç sesin mi?{/n} "O seni duysa bile umursayacak mı sandın? Theodora'yı kurtarmadı, seni de kurtarmayacak. O'nun seçilmişi değilsin. Peki... Duanı hakikaten ölümsüz olan tanrılara, armağanlarını asla esirgemeyenlere, seni kabul etmeye her zaman hazır olanlara etsen nasıl olur?"
languages.original_text: {n}A familiar {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whisper{/d} is scratching at the periphery of your consciousness. Or is it an inner voice?{/n} "Even if He hears you, what does He care? He did not save Theodora. He will not save you either. You are not His chosen one. But what if... you offer a prayer to the gods that are truly immortal? The ones who do not hold back with their gifts? The ones who are always willing to accept you?"
